TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_olit, title = olit, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/olit} }

S.FORM: == olit == kwohe ga sinu ana nni'un na cyolu uy. olit ga, mita' ngyaw lga, mutu kinsuruw mgyay la. olit na ksumuk hiya' ga, blaq nya' maki' talap ngasal. cipuq cikay hi' nya' ru blaq nya' balay qmihuy slaq ru hriqun nya' kwara' pinuya'.

== olit == kwohe ga sino ana nni'on na cyolo oy. olit ga, mita' ngyaw lga, moto kinsorow mgyay la. olit na ksomok hiya' ga, blaq nya' maki' talap ngasal. cipoq cikay hi' nya' ro blaq nya' balay qmihoy slaq ro hriqon nya' kwara' pinoya'.
